title: RELATING TO TRANSFER OF EMPLOYEE BENEFITS.
subject: Break in Service
EUTF
Public Employees Benefits
Sick and Vacation Leave
Transfer

abstracts.abstract: Requires the State, Legislature, and counties to amend rules and policies to ensure that certain employees can transfer accrued vacation and sick leaves if rehired by the State or a county within one calendar year of separation.  Extends the allowable break in service for purposes of determining certain state and county contributions to the Hawaii Employer-Union Health Benefits Trust Fund from ninety calendar days to one full year.
